inventory.commentary: Duplicate sense assignments for WN sense 1

sense.name: Determine the nature of a non-medical problem.
sense.commentary: Syntax Includes: NP1[agent] DIAGNOSE NP2[patient[inanimate]] NP1[agent] DIAGNOSE NP2[patient[abstract]]
sense.examples: We must diagnose the situation carefully or there will be political fallout. He diagnosed the computer problem correctly. Don't diagnose blame without looking at the evidence!

sense.name: Determine the nature of a medical or psychological problem.
sense.examples: John diagnosed Mary with acute violent tendencies. The vet diagnosed the dog with cancer. It's hard to diagnose a patient presenting these symptoms.
